{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = SpectralLightningDeathShort | class = SpectralLightningDeathShort | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]]→SpectralLightningDeathShort
 →[[Classes:SpectralLightningV1|SpectralLightningV1]]
  →[[Classes:SpectralLightningV2|SpectralLightningV2]]
A variant of [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]] that skips the first SIX frames of it's death animation. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SpectralLightningDeathShort : [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]] { States { Death: Goto Super::Death+6 } }
